<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Check to see if the loop has a canonical induction variable: an integer</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// recurrence that starts at 0 and increments by one each time through the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// loop. If so, return the phi node that corresponds to it.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The IndVarSimplify pass transforms loops to have a canonical induction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// variable.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &#42;getCanonicalInductionVariable() </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Obtain the unique incoming and back edge. Return false if they are</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> getIncomingAndBackEdge(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/incoming">Incoming</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Below are some utilities to get the loop guard, loop bounds and induction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// variable, and to check if a given phinode is an auxiliary induction</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// variable, if the loop is guarded, and if the loop is canonical.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Here is an example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// for (int i = lb; i &lt; ub; i+=step)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &lt;loop body&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// --- pseudo LLVMIR ---</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// beforeloop:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   guardcmp = (lb &lt; ub)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   if (guardcmp) goto preheader; else goto afterloop</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// preheader:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// loop:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   i&#95;1 = phi&#91;&#123;lb, preheader&#125;, &#123;i&#95;2, latch&#125;&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   &lt;loop body&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   i&#95;2 = i&#95;1 + step</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// latch:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   cmp = (i&#95;2 &lt; ub)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   if (cmp) goto loop</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// exit:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// afterloop:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// - getBounds</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - getInitialIVValue      --&gt; lb</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - getStepInst            --&gt; i&#95;2 = i&#95;1 + step</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - getStepValue           --&gt; step</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - getFinalIVValue        --&gt; ub</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - getCanonicalPredicate  --&gt; &#39;&lt;&#39;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   - getDirection           --&gt; Increasing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// - getInductionVariable            --&gt; i&#95;1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// - isAuxiliaryInductionVariable(x) --&gt; true if x == i&#95;1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// - getLoopGuardBranch()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                 --&gt; &#96;if (guardcmp) goto preheader; else goto afterloop&#96;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// - isGuarded()                     --&gt; true</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// - isCanonical                     --&gt; false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">LoopBounds &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Return the LoopBounds object if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// - the given \\p IndVar is an induction variable</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// - the initial value of the induction variable can be found</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// - the step instruction of the induction variable can be found</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// - the final value of the induction variable can be found</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Else std::nullopt.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::optional&lt;Loop::LoopBounds&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a075be8282fe6debdda46c86d24a07684">getBounds</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Loop &amp;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp;IndVar, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Get the initial value of the loop induction variable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#aef50b00cc2255dbd10973bfc3037ed6d"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#aef50b00cc2255dbd10973bfc3037ed6d">getInitialIVValue</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> InitialIVValue; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Get the instruction that updates the loop induction variable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#aa9f6ce7426d11ba1d161c9ab70c165eb"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#aa9f6ce7426d11ba1d161c9ab70c165eb">getStepInst</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StepInst; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Get the step that the loop induction variable gets updated by in each</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// loop iteration. Return nullptr if not found.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a8c3f3e19245c65fd42f3dd807a9f58a9"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a8c3f3e19245c65fd42f3dd807a9f58a9">getStepValue</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> StepValue; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Get the final value of the loop induction variable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a1d893e58d8dc7d1b3453ad94392761f7"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a1d893e58d8dc7d1b3453ad94392761f7">getFinalIVValue</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FinalIVValue; &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Return the canonical predicate for the latch compare instruction, if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// able to be calcuated. Else BAD&#95;ICMP&#95;PREDICATE.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// A predicate is considered as canonical if requirements below are all</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// satisfied:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// 1 The first successor of the latch branch is the loop header</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///    If not, inverse the predicate.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// 2 One of the operands of the latch comparison is StepInst</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///    If not, and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///    - if the current calcuated predicate is not ne or eq, flip the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///      predicate.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///    - else if the loop is increasing, return slt</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///      (notice that it is safe to change from ne or eq to sign compare)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///    - else if the loop is decreasing, return sgt</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///      (notice that it is safe to change from ne or eq to sign compare)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Here is an example when both (1) and (2) are not satisfied:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// loop.header:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///  %iv = phi &#91;%initialiv, %loop.preheader&#93;, &#91;%inc, %loop.header&#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///  %inc = add %iv, %step</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///  %cmp = slt %iv, %finaliv</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///  br %cmp, %loop.exit, %loop.header</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// loop.exit:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// \\endcode</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// - The second successor of the latch branch is the loop header instead</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///   of the first successor (slt -&gt; sge)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// - The first operand of the latch comparison (%cmp) is the IndVar (%iv)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///   instead of the StepInst (%inc) (sge -&gt; sgt)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">    ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// The predicate would be sgt if both (1) and (2) are satisfied.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// getCanonicalPredicate() returns sgt for this example.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Note: The IR is not changed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">ICmpInst::Predicate</a> getCanonicalPredicate() </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// An enum for the direction of the loop</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// - for (int i = 0; i &lt; ub; ++i)  --&gt; Increasing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// - for (int i = ub; i &gt; 0; --i)  --&gt; Descresing</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// - for (int i = x; i != y; i+=z) --&gt; Unknown</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a1c06ad0290f168148c08edc0ce69703fa2e6a9b0375c021e8f650a5eb22012b5b"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a1c06ad0290f168148c08edc0ce69703f">Direction</a> &#123; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a1c06ad0290f168148c08edc0ce69703faf3ff61f20d0c8eedfa348b0298df5edd">Increasing</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a1c06ad0290f168148c08edc0ce69703fa2e6a9b0375c021e8f650a5eb22012b5b">Decreasing</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/loop/loopbounds/#a1c06ad0290f168148c08edc0ce69703fa88183b946cc5f0e8c96b2e66e1c74a7e">Unknown</a> &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Get the direction of the loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp/#ab4c7e3039b29b12e4dc97bcae93d79c3">Direction</a> getDirection() </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the struct LoopBounds collected if all struct members are found,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// else std::nullopt.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::optional&lt;LoopBounds&gt; getBounds(ScalarEvolution &amp;SE) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the loop induction variable if found, else return nullptr.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// An instruction is considered as the loop induction variable if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// - it is an induction variable of the loop; and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// - it is used to determine the condition of the branch in the loop latch</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Note: the induction variable doesn&#39;t need to be canonical, i.e. starts at</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// zero and increments by one each time through the loop (but it can be).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return true if the given PHINode \\p AuxIndVar is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// - in the loop header</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// - not used outside of the loop</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the loop guard branch, if it exists.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This currently only works on simplified loop, as it requires a preheader</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// and a latch to identify the guard. It will work on loops of the form:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\code</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// GuardBB:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   br cond1, Preheader, ExitSucc &lt;== GuardBranch</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Preheader:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   br Header</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Header:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///  ...</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   br Latch</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Latch:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   br cond2, Header, ExitBlock</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// ExitBlock:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///   br ExitSucc</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// ExitSucc:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\endcode</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal">  BranchInst &#42;getLoopGuardBranch() </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns true if the loop is annotated parallel.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// A parallel loop can be assumed to not contain any dependencies between</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// iterations by the compiler. That is, any loop-carried dependency checking</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// can be skipped completely when parallelizing the loop on the target</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// machine. Thus, if the parallel loop information originates from the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// programmer, e.g. via the OpenMP parallel for pragma, it is the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// programmer&#39;s responsibility to ensure there are no loop-carried</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// dependencies. The final execution order of the instructions across</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// iterations is not guaranteed, thus, the end result might or might not</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// implement actual concurrent execution of instructions across multiple</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// iterations.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> isAnnotatedParallel() </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Update LoopInfo after removing the last backedge from a loop. This updates</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the loop forest and parent loops for each block so that \\c L is no longer</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// referenced, but does not actually delete \\c L immediately. The pointer</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns true if replacing From with To everywhere is guaranteed to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// preserve LCSSA form.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo/#ab12b535502b86394c84bfd24d58e4657"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo/#ab12b535502b86394c84bfd24d58e4657">replacementPreservesLCSSAForm</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;To) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Preserving LCSSA form is only problematic if the replacing value is an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If both instructions are defined in the same basic block then replacement</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// cannot break LCSSA form.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the instruction is not defined in a loop then it can safely replace</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// anything.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the replacing instruction is defined in the same loop as the original</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction, or in a loop that contains it as an inner loop, then using</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Checks if moving a specific instruction can break LCSSA in any loop.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return true if moving \\p Inst to before \\p NewLoc will break LCSSA,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// assuming that the function containing \\p Inst and \\p NewLoc is currently</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// in LCSSA form.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo/#aee580d948709366b6a676f8b48460137"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo/#aee580d948709366b6a676f8b48460137">movementPreservesLCSSAForm</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;Inst, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;NewLoc) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Movement within the same loop does not break LCSSA (the equality check is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if Outer contains Inner; with the null loop counting as the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &quot;outermost&quot; loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// To check that the movement of Inst to before NewLoc does not break LCSSA,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we need to check two sets of uses for possible LCSSA violations at</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// NewLoc: the users of NewInst, and the operands of NewInst.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This would need adjustment if we allow Inst to be a phi node -- the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// new use block won&#39;t simply be NewBB.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;DefBlock = DefI-&gt;getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DefBlock != NewBB &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfobase/#ad61bd84d4988c90bf6c5cd62d8e7fb00">getLoopFor</a>(DefBlock) != NewLoop)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Return true if a new use of V added in ExitBB would require an LCSSA PHI</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to be inserted at the begining of the block.  Note that V is assumed to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dominate ExitBB, and ExitBB must be the exit block of some loop.  The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// IR is assumed to be in LCSSA form before the planned insertion.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> wouldBeOutOfLoopUseRequiringLCSSA(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;V,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ExitBB) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="comment">/// flag allows the checks to be enabled selectively without re-compilation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
